context: Community college system serving 25,000 students facing declining completion rates and budget constraints, considering investment in AI-driven adaptive learning platform

request.purpose: Implement comprehensive adaptive learning platform with personalized curriculum delivery and predictive analytics for student success
request.justification: Address 35% student dropout rate and improve learning outcomes with limited additional faculty resources

decision_process.outcome: Clear need for personalized learning solutions identified
Three platform options shortlisted with detailed comparisons
85% faculty support secured with comprehensive training plan

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% improvement in student retention and 20% increase in course completion rates
business_impact.projected_value: $12,000,000 in long-term savings through improved efficiency and reduced remediation needs

lessons_learned: Early faculty involvement and comprehensive change management were critical to successful adoption
